channel.title: 06Kayos | Brand New Remake!
channel.description:
[CENTER][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/LkFz4sg.png[/img] URL: [URL=http://"http://www.06kayos.com"]www.06kayos.com[/URL]
[SIZE=2][B][I]What is 06Kayos? [/I][/B][I]06Kayos is the most developed remake you have ever witnessed, we've been in development for over a year and we've made substantial progress than any other remake in history! But do not take our word for it, let us show you?
We've noticed there are a great amount of aspiring remakes around this area and we can [B]promise [/B]you that we're better than any of them put together. We've created and formed a whole staff team from different remakes to create one great, exciting story for you all to indulge in,[B] 06KAYOS!
06Kayos [/B]has been around for quite some time, we saw this opportunity and saved what is left of the 2006 era, this project has been on-going for over a year now and we're ready to give the public a small taste of what is to come. Our former remakes were: [B]2006Revived 06Prime 06Kayos[/B]
In which all of these developers, creators and managers have come together to make the best, most enjoyable remake to date. [SIZE=2]You will not unimpressed. [/SIZE] [SIZE=2]The Team:[/SIZE] [SIZE=2]Head of Department: [/SIZE][/I][/SIZE][IMG]http://img2.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20111123045824/runescape/images/c/c6/Jagex_moderator_crown.png[/img][I][SIZE=2]Mod Fel[/SIZE][/I] [I][SIZE=2][SIZE=2] Head of Server [/SIZE]Infrastructure[SIZE=1]: [/SIZE][/SIZE][/I][IMG]http://img2.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20111123045824/runescape/images/c/c6/Jagex_moderator_crown.png[/img][I][SIZE=2]Mod Connor (DEVELOPERS NEEDED)[/SIZE][/I] [SIZE=1][I][SIZE=2]Head of Community Management: [/SIZE][/I][/SIZE][IMG]http://img2.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20111123045824/runescape/images/c/c6/Jagex_moderator_crown.png[/img][I][SIZE=2]Mod Jon[/SIZE][/I] [SIZE=1][I][SIZE=2]Head of Website Development: [/SIZE][/I][/SIZE][IMG]http://img2.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20111123045824/runescape/images/c/c6/Jagex_moderator_crown.png[/img][I][SIZE=2]Mod Tim[/SIZE][/I] [SIZE=1][I] [U][SIZE=5]Current Features [/SIZE][/U][/I][/SIZE][I]Key: - [COLOR=#FFA500]Under development[/COLOR] - [COLOR=#008000]Finished [/COLOR] [/I][SPOILER][I][COLOR=#008000] [/COLOR][/I][IMG]http://www.zybez.net/img/genimg/gettingstart/worldmap.gif[/img][B][U]World[/U][/B] [I][COLOR=#008000][B]Item dropping (global) Pathfinding Clipping (Player movement) [/B][/COLOR][B][COLOR=#008000]Searches (drawers, hay bales, cupboards)[/COLOR][/B][U][B]
Client Features[/B][/U] [B][COLOR=#008000]- Loading full 377 - Auto cache downloader - Full music system (fading music) - Enter to login - Ability to use k/m/b with money - Quick reply option for private messages - Multi platform support - Fast client[/COLOR] [/B]
[U][B][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/t0SHW.gif[/img]Prayer[/B][/U] [B][COLOR=#008000]- All bones bury-able - Every prayer working properly - Prayer bonus affects prayer drain rate - Zombie Random[/COLOR][/B]
[B][U][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/YnmBh.gif[/img]Agility[/U] [COLOR=#008000]- Gnome, Brimhaven, and Wilderness, Pyramid, Werewolf courses usable - Force movement mask - Correct animations used - Run energy affected by weight and level[/COLOR]
[B][U][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/4Ou9K.gif[/img]Mining[/U] [COLOR=#008000]- Empty and refilling rock's - All ore can be mined - Prospecting - Random chance of obtaining gem's - Rune essence - Granite - Sand-Stone[/COLOR]
[B][U][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/Bbq6R.gif[/img]Smithing[/U] [COLOR=#008000]- All bars smithable - Smelting - Correct animations, working interfaces & objects[/COLOR]
[B][U][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/HFOC2.gif[/img][/U][U]Fishing[/U] [COLOR=#008000]- All fish can be caught - Big net fishing - Correct item requirements - Fishing spots located all around the world - Correct animations[/COLOR]
[B][U][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/Xvfj1.gif[/img]Cooking[/U] [COLOR=#008000]- All fishes cookable - All meat cookable - Pizzas, cakes, pies, stews. - Cooking gauntlets - Correct anims & delays - Working interface with multiple amount options - Lumbridge cooking range bonus - Eating food - Wine[/COLOR]
[B][U][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/QrNzk.gif[/img]Woodcutting[/U] [COLOR=#008000]- Stumps and re-growing trees - Correct hatchet finding - Correct hatchet animations - All trees cut-able - Correct fall chance algorithms - Birds nest falling out - Broken axe random event - Spirit Tree[/COLOR] [COLOR=#FFA500]- Canoes (not all finished)[/COLOR]
[B][U][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/0HOQK.gif[/img]Firemaking[/U] [COLOR=#008000]- Correct anims - Ashes - All logs lightable - Colored fires - Clipped - Can't light fires in Bank - Can click logs on the ground and light them[/COLOR]
[B][U][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/I4pJ6.gif[/img]Fletching[/U] [COLOR=#008000]- All logs can be fletched - Correct interfaces - Fletch 5, 10, x, all[/COLOR]
[B][U][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/5zdcP.gif[/img]Crafting[/U] [COLOR=#008000]- Gem cutting - Tanning - Spinning & Picking flax - Pottery - Jewellery Moulding[/COLOR]
[B][U][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/KbkQ8.gif[/img]Thieving[/U] [COLOR=#008000]- Stall Thieving - NPC Thieving - Correct anims & gfx - Correct Respawn Time[/COLOR]
[B][U][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/bUmTj.gif[/img]Runecrafting[/U] [COLOR=#008000]- Altar Entering - Tiaras - All Altars - Abyss[/COLOR]
[B][U][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/7wikM.gif[/img]Herblore[/U] [COLOR=#008000]- All potions makeable - Identifying herbs - Weapon poisoning[/COLOR]
[HR][/HR]
[U][B][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/2EJAV.gif[/img]Combat[/B][/U] [COLOR=#008000]- PvP fully complete - PvN fully complete - X-logging (if disconnected during combat, logs out only after 60secs or death) - Perfect max hit formulas - Perfect accuracy formula - Every weapon special attack - Equipment effects (i.e. barrow upgrades) - Equipment requirements - Weapon poisoning[/COLOR]
[B][U][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/HtjDm.gif[/img]Slayer[/U] [COLOR=#008000]- Working slayer gems - Working slayer shop - Tasks where you are required to wield any special equipment, e.g. boots out of the slayer shop - Generating task's bound on combat level/slayer level - Remove task forever for slayer points - Cancel task for slayer points - All slayer masters - All slayer masters can give you the slayer location - XP after each killed NPC, + XP after finishing task[/COLOR]
[B][U][IMG]http://www.runerebels.com/images/kevin/sprites/headicons_pk%200.png[/img]Bosses[/U] [COLOR=#008000]-TzTok-Jad -Big Wolf -Chaos Elemental -Count Draynor -Dagannoth Supreme -Dagganoth Rex -Dagannoth Prime -Giant Mole -Gunthor the Brave -Kalphite Queen -King Black Dragon[/COLOR]
[HR][/HR]
[B][U][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/KKQ7R.png[/img]Quests[/U] [COLOR=#008000]-Cook's Assistant -Doric's Quest -Imp Catcher -Pirates Treasure -Restless Ghost -Rune Mysteries -Sheep Shearer -Vampyre Slayer -Witch's Potion -Gertrudes Cat -Tutorial island added (Npcs, dialogues, doors, all tasks, etc)[/COLOR]
[B][U][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/R4MMI.png[/img]Music & Sounds[/U] [COLOR=#FFA500]-All skilling sounds (93% finished) -All combat sounds (97% finished)[/COLOR] [COLOR=#008000]-Working music player and unlocking -Music playing in all regions -Music fade and volume control[/COLOR]
[B][U][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/uzR97.png[/img]Mini-games[/U] [COLOR=#008000]-Duel Arena -Castle Wars -Fight Caves -Barrows Brothers -Fight Pits -Pest Control [/COLOR][COLOR=#ffa500]-Fishing Trawler[/COLOR]
[B][U][IMG]http://images4.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20080320193236/runescape/images/archive/3/37/20090906074416%21Lamp.png[/img]Random Events[/U] [COLOR=#008000]-Broken axe random -Bird Nests -Sand which Lady -Genie -Rock Golem -Spirit Tree -Zombie -Evil Chicken - Swarm - Shade - Whirlpool -Random Event Handling System -No random in tut island, in certain areas, etc...[/COLOR]
[B][U][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/QR4Lh.png[/img]Miscellaneous[/U] [COLOR=#008000]- Random event handler that works great with all random events - Skill handler that works great with all skills - Quest handler that works great with f2p or p2p quests - Around 10 random events in place as of now - All skills done to full completion - Water fillables (using vials, buckets, jugs, etc. on water sources) - Pick-ables (cabbages, onions, wheat, etc.) - Skill interfaces - Pets - Working objects all around the world - Almost every rs npc spawned all around the world - Changelog with 900 changes now - Christmas Crackers - Holiday events handler - Working desert - Single and double doors - Dupe free guarantee (If you find a dupe it will be patched asap). - Runescape guilds - All food that runescape had in 2006 - Normal and ancient magics, ancients is for members only - All runescapes shops that were in 2006 - All runescapes potions - Correct runescape start - Sailing - Gnome Glider - Bank Pins - Correct runescape teleports - Wilderness warning - All rings/amulets loaded - Al kharid/shantay pass w/dialogues & items req - Tele tabs - Teleother - Lots of minigames - Clipping following/npcs - Empty handler added for items that can be emptied - Crystal Chest - Flour Mill - Logging system for every type of thing to make sure no one gets scammed - Update Cache - Members Only Benefits - Runescape prices - Chat filtering - Running/w energy - Magic Carpet - Skill Guides - Same or close to same exp rates as runescape will be voted for - Weapon Poisoning [/COLOR][COLOR=#ffa500]- Member only worlds[/COLOR][COLOR=#008000] - Members get 352 bank slots while non members get 100 - Members get to attend any testing phase that is open before the server starts - Members get a donator only forum section - Members get to use simple BBcode such as Bold, Italics, and Underline.
[/COLOR][/B][/B][/B][/B][/B][/B][/B][/B][/B][/B][/B][/B][/B][/B][/B][/B][/B][/B][/B]Do not think this is all we have to offer, there is much much more, in which will come nearer the future. [/I][I] [B][B][B][B][B][B][B][B][B][B][B][B][B][B][B][B][B][B][B][COLOR=#008000] [/COLOR][/B][/B][/B][/B][/B][/B][/B][/B][/B][/B][/B][/B][/B][/B][/B][/B][/B][/B][/B][/I][IMG]http://i61.tinypic.com/2rcpy0k.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i57.tinypic.com/261lo41.gif[/img] [IMG]http://i62.tinypic.com/ohkbr8.png[/img] [IMG]http://i62.tinypic.com/33m4f2g.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i61.tinypic.com/11caxc9.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i58.tinypic.com/245brxw.png[/img] [IMG]http://i59.tinypic.com/2e2p98g.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i58.tinypic.com/9uc7zl.png[/img] [IMG]http://i61.tinypic.com/2e2fnur.gif[/img] [IMG]http://i58.tinypic.com/6ohegz.gif[/img] [IMG]http://i59.tinypic.com/52xopk.gif[/img] [/SPOILER]
[IMG]http://i60.tinypic.com/vzcxzd.png[/img] [I]2006Scape Jagex R-S Community Fel Connor Jon Tim Pax [/I]
[I][B][COLOR=#008000]
[/COLOR][/B][/I] [/CENTER]

item.title: 06Kayos | Brand New Remake!
item.dc:creator: @sorecheeny sorecheeny
item.description:
@sorecheeny wrote:

[quote=“Jon of 06Kayos, post:8, topic:547213”][quote author=sorecheeny link=topic=666116.msg4453956#msg4453956 date=1413490026]

Our former remakes were:
[B]2006Revived
06Prime[/B]

Yeah okay, 06Prime and 2006Revived has nothing to do with you guys. Please contact the owners before you decided to credit yourself?
[/quote]

2006Revived was created by Mod Brute, and later taken over by Mod Morcion. :)[/quote]

Did Brute contribute anything to the server besides stealing money and bullshitting the staff members?
No, Austin and Morcion did all of the changes to the server. Did Connor do anything either? Yeah, like 3 updates. And all of them were for minigames that DIDN’T EVEN WORK.

The only thing that Connor has for Kayos now is taking the 2006Revived source and using it for you guys, without any permission at all.

Read full topic

item.title: 06Kayos | Brand New Remake!
item.dc:creator: @Jon_of_06Kayos Jon of 06Kayos
item.description:
@Jon_of_06Kayos wrote:

[CENTER]
URL: [URL=http://“http://www.06kayos.com”]www.06kayos.com[/URL]

[SIZE=2][B][I]What is 06Kayos?
[/I][/B][I]06Kayos is the most developed remake you have ever witnessed, we’ve been in development for over a year and we’ve made substantial progress than
any other remake in history! But do not take our word for it, let us show you?

We’ve noticed there are a great amount of aspiring remakes around this area and we can [B]promise [/B]you that we’re better than any of them put together.
We’ve created and formed a whole staff team from different remakes to create one great, exciting story for you all to indulge in,[B] 06KAYOS!

06Kayos [/B]has been around for quite some time, we saw this opportunity and saved what is left of the 2006 era, this project has been on-going for over a year now and we’re
ready to give the public a small taste of what is to come. Our former remakes were:
[B]2006Revived
06Prime
06Kayos[/B]

In which all of these developers, creators and managers have come together to make the best, most enjoyable remake to date.
[SIZE=2]You will not unimpressed.
[/SIZE]
[SIZE=2]The Team:[/SIZE]
[SIZE=2]Head of Department: [/SIZE][/I][/SIZE][I][SIZE=2]Mod Fel[/SIZE][/I]
[I][SIZE=2][SIZE=2] Head of Server [/SIZE]Infrastructure[SIZE=1]: [/SIZE][/SIZE][/I][I][SIZE=2]Mod Connor (DEVELOPERS NEEDED)[/SIZE][/I]
[SIZE=1][I][SIZE=2]Head of Community Management: [/SIZE][/I][/SIZE][I][SIZE=2]Mod Jon[/SIZE][/I]
[SIZE=1][I][SIZE=2]Head of Website Development: [/SIZE][/I][/SIZE][I][SIZE=2]Mod Tim[/SIZE][/I]
[SIZE=1][I]
[U][SIZE=5]Current Features
[/SIZE][/U][/I][/SIZE][I]Key:

  • [COLOR=#FFA500]Under development[/COLOR]
  • [COLOR=#008000]Finished
    [/COLOR]
    [/I][SPOILER][I][COLOR=#008000]
    [/COLOR][/I][B][U]World[/U][/B]
    [I][COLOR=#008000][B]Item dropping (global)
    Pathfinding
    Clipping (Player movement)
    [/B][/COLOR][B][COLOR=#008000]Searches (drawers, hay bales, cupboards)[/COLOR][/B][U][B]

Client Features[/B][/U]
[B][COLOR=#008000]- Loading full 377

  • Auto cache downloader
  • Full music system (fading music)
  • Enter to login
  • Ability to use k/m/b with money
  • Quick reply option for private messages
  • Multi platform support
  • Fast client[/COLOR]
    [/B]

[U][B]Prayer[/B][/U]
[B][COLOR=#008000]- All bones bury-able

  • Every prayer working properly
  • Prayer bonus affects prayer drain rate
  • Zombie Random[/COLOR][/B]

[B][U]Agility[/U]
[COLOR=#008000]- Gnome, Brimhaven, and Wilderness, Pyramid, Werewolf courses usable

  • Force movement mask
  • Correct animations used
  • Run energy affected by weight and level[/COLOR]

[B][U]Mining[/U]
[COLOR=#008000]- Empty and refilling rock’s

  • All ore can be mined
  • Prospecting
  • Random chance of obtaining gem’s
  • Rune essence
  • Granite
  • Sand-Stone[/COLOR]

[B][U]Smithing[/U]
[COLOR=#008000]- All bars smithable

  • Smelting
  • Correct animations, working interfaces & objects[/COLOR]

[B][U][/U][U]Fishing[/U]
[COLOR=#008000]- All fish can be caught

  • Big net fishing
  • Correct item requirements
  • Fishing spots located all around the world
  • Correct animations[/COLOR]

[B][U]Cooking[/U]
[COLOR=#008000]- All fishes cookable

  • All meat cookable
  • Pizzas, cakes, pies, stews.
  • Cooking gauntlets
  • Correct anims & delays
  • Working interface with multiple amount options
  • Lumbridge cooking range bonus
  • Eating food
  • Wine[/COLOR]

[B][U]Woodcutting[/U]
[COLOR=#008000]- Stumps and re-growing trees

  • Correct hatchet finding
  • Correct hatchet animations
  • All trees cut-able
  • Correct fall chance algorithms
  • Birds nest falling out
  • Broken axe random event
  • Spirit Tree[/COLOR]
    [COLOR=#FFA500]- Canoes (not all finished)[/COLOR]

[B][U]Firemaking[/U]
[COLOR=#008000]- Correct anims

  • Ashes
  • All logs lightable
  • Colored fires
  • Clipped
  • Can’t light fires in Bank
  • Can click logs on the ground and light them[/COLOR]

[B][U]Fletching[/U]
[COLOR=#008000]- All logs can be fletched

  • Correct interfaces
  • Fletch 5, 10, x, all[/COLOR]

[B][U]Crafting[/U]
[COLOR=#008000]- Gem cutting

  • Tanning
  • Spinning & Picking flax
  • Pottery
  • Jewellery Moulding[/COLOR]

[B][U]Thieving[/U]
[COLOR=#008000]- Stall Thieving

  • NPC Thieving
  • Correct anims & gfx
  • Correct Respawn Time[/COLOR]

[B][U]Runecrafting[/U]
[COLOR=#008000]- Altar Entering

  • Tiaras
  • All Altars
  • Abyss[/COLOR]

[B][U]Herblore[/U]
[COLOR=#008000]- All potions makeable

  • Identifying herbs
  • Weapon poisoning[/COLOR]

[HR][/HR]

[U][B]Combat[/B][/U]
[COLOR=#008000]- PvP fully complete

  • PvN fully complete
  • X-logging (if disconnected during combat, logs out only after 60secs or death)
  • Perfect max hit formulas
  • Perfect accuracy formula
  • Every weapon special attack
  • Equipment effects (i.e. barrow upgrades)
  • Equipment requirements
  • Weapon poisoning[/COLOR]

[B][U]Slayer[/U]
[COLOR=#008000]- Working slayer gems

  • Working slayer shop
  • Tasks where you are required to wield any special equipment, e.g. boots out of the slayer shop
  • Generating task’s bound on combat level/slayer level
  • Remove task forever for slayer points
  • Cancel task for slayer points
  • All slayer masters
  • All slayer masters can give you the slayer location
  • XP after each killed NPC, + XP after finishing task[/COLOR]

[B][U]Bosses[/U]
[COLOR=#008000]-TzTok-Jad
-Big Wolf
-Chaos Elemental
-Count Draynor
-Dagannoth Supreme
-Dagganoth Rex
-Dagannoth Prime
-Giant Mole
-Gunthor the Brave
-Kalphite Queen
-King Black Dragon[/COLOR]

[HR][/HR]

[B][U]Quests[/U]
[COLOR=#008000]-Cook’s Assistant
-Doric’s Quest
-Imp Catcher
-Pirates Treasure
-Restless Ghost
-Rune Mysteries
-Sheep Shearer
